amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-812 to strike section 5, which repeals the exclusion of independent agencies from reporting requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watson Coleman amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Watson Coleman.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Watson Coleman.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Watson Coleman amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
